bug.author: blairits
bug.summary: Sending requests longer than RATES|SYMBOL crashes MetaTrader 4
bug.description: Hello, I was trying to set this up. But when sending rquests longer then the RATES|GBPUSD command causes an error in ZeroMQ_MT4_EA_Template.mq4 and MetaTrader 4 crashes.

comments.comment: email me at <denchmark-link:mailto:blairits@gmail.com>blairits@gmail.com</denchmark-link> or odindarkmoor#7278 on discord

Hello, I was trying to set this up. But when sending rquests longer then the RATES|GBPUSD command causes an error in ZeroMQ_MT4_EA_Template.mq4 and MetaTrader 4 crashes.
Hi <denchmark-link:https://github.com/blairits>@blairits</denchmark-link> , We are in the process of releasing updated versions of all code concerning ZeroMQ to MetaTrader connectivity. New code releases will provide significant improvements to previous releases, and also support Python 3.6+! Stay tuned for updates, and apologies for the delay in responding to your queries! üëç
